text: Rodolfo Vera Quizon, Sr. (July 25, 1928 - July 10, 2012) was a Filipino, director, comedian, movie, television, stage, and radio actor. He is also known for his comedy works earning him the nickname as "The King of Comedy". Dolphy was born on July 25, 1928 in Tondo, Manila, Philippines on July 25, 1928.(2009-10-28). "'Dolphy at 80' World Tour" . Global Nation. Retrieved on 2011-03-30. He has 17 children and one adopted child by his partner Zsa Zsa Padilla. Dolphy died on July 10, 2012, aged 83, in Makati City, Metro Manila, Philippines from multiple organ failure after suffering pneumonia and renal failure. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Actors from Manila Category:Filipino comedians Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors Category:Filipino movie directors
title: Dolphy
